title: Ep. 35. The Crystal Kingdom - Chapter Seven
description: Our heroes recover after performing some impromptu emergency surgery on their holiest team member, and then, after kicking it for a while, learn the secrets of the universe. No big deal. Taako tries on a new voice. Magnus does some backseat Regulating. Merle learns about an exciting new plant.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
